header.author: Paul Mensonides
header.overview: The header defines an algorithm that transforms the elements of a with a user-specified operation.

macro.abstract: The macro transforms each element of its second argument with the operation specified by its first argument.

usage.param:
The operation used to transform each element of seq. This operation must be either a or a macro name that refers to a macro with a signature compatible with the following pseudo-signature:
op(s, tuple)

macro.para:
This macro behaves identically to except that each element is wrapped in parentheses prior to being passed to the operation. For example, instead of the the operation being invoked as...
op(s, elem, data)
it is invoked as...
op(s, (elem), data)
